report_text: {{#if fatty_liver != 'None'}}The liver has normal size and diffusely increased echo pattern in favor of fatty liver ({{fatty_liver}}).{{/if}}
{{#if fatty_liver == 'None'}}The liver has normal size and echogenicity.{{/if}}
The spleen has normal size and echogenicity (spleen span: {{spleen_span}} mm).
{{#if hydronephrosis == false}}There is no evidence of hydronephrosis.{{/if}}
